pkgmetadata.longdescription: # 'irene-pro'This is my customized user interface which is rooted from tkinter package.nothing big that I did from here that is different from what already in tkinter, but I rather set my default parameters and styles for those rooted to ttk, example Combobox.this is the first version, and later I will keep making extra-improvement including adding default icons to buttons and othercool stuffs until it will be large package or framework in coming years.=========how to use the package======from irene-pro import widgets, logic# create buttonbutton = widgets.btn(master = root, text = 'send')button.pack(side = LEFT)# create table guitable = widgets.Table_gui(parent = root)
